meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bossy.
meanings.sent1: Her constant bossinesses made it difficult for others to work with her.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand her bossinesses when she tries to control everything.
meanings.sent3: His bossinesses at the family picnic led to a comical game of tug-of-war over the grill.
meanings.sent4: The bossinesses of the storm clouds demanded everyone seek shelter immediately.
meanings.sent5: The bossinesses of the traffic light was evident as it turned red abruptly.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of someone who is bossy.
meanings.sent1: She displayed her bossinesses by always telling others what to do.
meanings.sent2: His bossinesses in the group project caused tension among the team members.
meanings.sent3: The cat's bossinesses towards the dog resulted in a playful chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: The bossinesses of the alarm clock forced him to wake up early every morning.
meanings.sent5: The bossinesses of the toddler was evident as he insisted on choosing his own clothes.
